attributes.action: stop borrowing large amounts of money which artificially inflates economic growth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government keeps on borrowing large amounts of money which raises economic growth. However, these loans will have to be repaid. A private company or individual would be bankrupt. It is not financial competence but incompetence and deceit. It gives the false impression of a nealthy economy.
